member.name: T:Stemmer.Cvb.Barcode.Configuration.BaseClasses.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: The namespace Stemmer.Cvb.Barcode.Configuration.BaseClasses contains base classes for the different symbology-specific barcode reader configurations. These classes are usually abstract and not intended to be used directly but only through their derived classes which are located in Stemmer.Cvb.Barcode.Configuration.

member.summary: Run direction of the Pharma Code. The overall Barcode orientation mode of the reader will have no effect for Pharma Codes.

member.summary: Minimum number of digits in the code.

member.summary: Maximum number of digits in the code.

member.name: P:Stemmer.Cvb.Barcode.Configuration.PharmaCode.PixelReference
member.summary: Value that allows calibration of the Pharma codes pixel to real world dimensions. The PixelReference value defines how many 1/10 pixels there are to a millimeter. Valid values are in the interval [0...1000].

member.summary: Binarization threshold in %. Valid values are in the interval [0...100].

member.summary: Skew of the code bars to be expected.

member.summary: Set the tolerance level for Pharma Code reading.

member.summary: Highest possible number of rows/columns in a data matrix code.

member.summary: Formats of data matrix codes to read.

member.summary: Minimum number of lines and columns in one Data Matrix square. Valid values are in the interval [7...MaxSize].

member.name: P:Stemmer.Cvb.Barcode.Configuration.DataMatrix.MaxSize
member.summary: Maximum number of lines and columns in one Data Matrix square. Valid values are in the interval [MinSize...144].

member.summary: When set to true, the reader will also read none-square data matrix codes.

member.name: P:Stemmer.Cvb.Barcode.Configuration.DataMatrix.AllowDistorted
member.summary: When set to true, the reader will also read distorted data matrix codes. This flag will not have any effect when reading dotted data matrix codes.

member.summary: Sub type of data matrix code to read.

member.summary: Proofing of the color bar of field 2 on square or rectangular 2D Pharma Codes. Only relevant when reading 2D Pharma Codes.

member.name: P:Stemmer.Cvb.Barcode.Configuration.DataMatrix.PharmaCode2DBar3
member.summary: Proofing of the color bar of field 3 on square or rectangular 2D Pharma Codes. Only relevant when reading 2D Pharma Codes.

member.name: P:Stemmer.Cvb.Barcode.Configuration.DataMatrix.PharmaCode2DBar4
member.summary: Proofing of the color bar of field 1 on square or rectangular 2D Pharma Codes. Only relevant when reading 2D Pharma Codes.

member.name: P:Stemmer.Cvb.Barcode.Configuration.DataMatrix.PharmaCode2DBar5
member.summary: Proofing of the color bar of field 5 on square or rectangular 2D Pharma Codes. Only relevant when reading 2D Pharma Codes.

member.name: P:Stemmer.Cvb.Barcode.Configuration.DataMatrix.PharmaCode2DBar6
member.summary: Proofing of the color bar of field 6 on square or rectangular 2D Pharma Codes. Only relevant when reading 2D Pharma Codes.

member.name: P:Stemmer.Cvb.Barcode.Configuration.DataMatrix.PharmaCode2DBar7
member.summary: Proofing of the color bar of field 7 on square or rectangular 2D Pharma Codes. Only relevant when reading 2D Pharma Codes.

member.name: P:Stemmer.Cvb.Barcode.Configuration.DataMatrix.PharmaCode2DBar8

member.name: P:Stemmer.Cvb.Barcode.Configuration.DataMatrix.PharmaCode2DThreshold
member.summary: Binarization threshold in %. Valid values are in the interval [0...100]. Only relevant when reading 2D Pharma Codes.

member.name: P:Stemmer.Cvb.Barcode.Configuration.DataMatrix.PharmaCode2DExpanded
member.summary: When set to true, the reader will also read expanded 2D Pharma Codes. Only relevant when reading 2D Pharma Codes.

member.name: P:Stemmer.Cvb.Barcode.Configuration.DataMatrix.DottedContrast
member.summary: Minimum contrast value for dotted data matrix codes. Only relevant when reading dotted data matrix codes. Valid values are in the interval [10...100]

member.name: P:Stemmer.Cvb.Barcode.Configuration.DataMatrix.DottedModuleWidth
member.summary: Minimum module width for dotted data matrix codes. Only relevant when reading dotted data matrix codes. Valid values are in the interval [30...150]

member.name: P:Stemmer.Cvb.Barcode.Configuration.DataMatrix.DottedQuietzoneWidth
member.summary: Minimum quiet zone width for dotted data matrix codes. Only relevant when reading dotted data matrix codes. Valid values are in the interval [3...5]

member.name: F:Stemmer.Cvb.Barcode.Configuration.QR.MinVersionMiniQRLowest
member.summary: Lowest possible version for mini QR reading.

member.name: F:Stemmer.Cvb.Barcode.Configuration.QR.MaxVersionMiniQRHighest
member.summary: Highest possible version for mini QR reading.

member.name: F:Stemmer.Cvb.Barcode.Configuration.QR.MinVersionStandardQRLowest
member.summary: Lowest possible version for mini QR reading.

member.name: F:Stemmer.Cvb.Barcode.Configuration.QR.MaxVersionStandardQRHighest
member.summary: Highest possible version for mini QR reading.

member.name: P:Stemmer.Cvb.Barcode.Configuration.QR.MinVersionMiniQR
member.summary: Lowest version of Mini QR codes to read. Valid values are in the interval [1...MaxVersionMiniQR].

member.name: P:Stemmer.Cvb.Barcode.Configuration.QR.MaxVersionMiniQR
member.summary: Highest version of Mini QR codes to read. Valid values are in the interval [MinVersionMiniQR...4].

member.name: P:Stemmer.Cvb.Barcode.Configuration.QR.MinVersionStandardQR
member.summary: Lowest version of Mini QR codes to read. Valid values are in the interval [1...MaxVersionMiniQR].

member.name: P:Stemmer.Cvb.Barcode.Configuration.QR.MaxVersionStandardQR
member.summary: Highest version of Standard QR codes to read. Valid values are in the interval [MinVersionStandardQR...4].

member.summary: Determine which varieties of QR codes to read.

member.name: P:Stemmer.Cvb.Barcode.Configuration.RSS.Types
member.summary: Determine which RSS code types to read.

member.name: P:Stemmer.Cvb.Barcode.Configuration.RSS.Orientation
member.summary: Orientation of the RSS code. This will override the reader's readout orientation.

member.name: T:Stemmer.Cvb.Barcode.Configuration.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: The namespace Stemmer.Cvb.Barcode.Configuration contains what is necessary to define a configuration for either barcode reading or barcode grading (see and ).

member.summary: The types implemented in the namespace and assembly Stemmer.Cvb.Barcode and its sub namespaces expose the features of the CVCBarcode.dll in Cvb.Net.

member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Stemmer.Cvb.Barcode.Properties.Messages.DataMatrixConfigurationRequired
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to For this operation a data matrix reader configuration is required..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The {0} file '{1}' does not exist..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The {0} object has already been disposed of and may not be used any longer..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to An internal error occurred. Please report this to support@stemmer-imaging.de along with the call stack if possible..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to {0} is the wrong configuration type for the symbology {1}..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The key {0} already exists..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to It is not possible to set a configuration for the symbology "None"..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The grading method {0} was selected, but no suitable reading configuration was defined..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Saving the {0} to file {1} failed..

member.name: P:Stemmer.Cvb.Barcode.Properties.Messages.ValueOutOfRange
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Value is out of range ({0} <= {1} < {2})..

member.name: F:Stemmer.Cvb.Barcode.DecodeResult.NothingFound
member.summary: No code was found in the area of interest.

member.name: F:Stemmer.Cvb.Barcode.DecodeResult.SymbologyOnly
member.summary: A code symbology was detected in the area of interest but reading the code failed.

member.name: F:Stemmer.Cvb.Barcode.DecodeResult.WrongCodeSize
member.summary: A code symbology was detected and decoded, but the code had an unexpected size that violates the limits of the symbology.

member.name: F:Stemmer.Cvb.Barcode.DecodeResult.WrongCodeFormat
member.summary: A code symbology was detected and decoded, but the code turned out to have the wrong format.

member.name: F:Stemmer.Cvb.Barcode.DecodeResult.ErrorDetectionFailed
member.summary: A code symbology was detected and decoded, but the error detection checks failed.

member.name: F:Stemmer.Cvb.Barcode.DecodeResult.ColorNotCorrect
member.summary: A 2D Pharmacode uses and invalid color bar.

member.name: F:Stemmer.Cvb.Barcode.DecodeResult.QuietzoneViolation
member.summary: A code symbology was detected and decoded but the code violates the quiet zone requirements.

member.name: F:Stemmer.Cvb.Barcode.DecodeResult.Error
member.summary: An unspecified error occurred during code reading.

area of interest to work in

member.exception: if no data matrix configuration was specified

member.summary: Read a barcode no matter what the orientation of the bars is.

member.summary: Read a barcode only if the bars are oriented horizontally.

member.summary: Expect the barcodes to be very small.

member.summary: Raised when this object is about to be disposed via the method.

member.summary: Set a new barcode configuration for a given symbology. Set configuration to null to delete it.

member.summary: Remove the configuration for symbology. Effect is the same as if calling Remove(Symbology sym) with the corresponding symbology enum.
member.returns: true if the symbology was previously set and is now removed; false if the symbology wasn't configured previously.
